item: Cellular dynamics and mechanism of keratinization of the skin
Skin rash (erythema, purpura, pigmentation, papule, nodule, mass, blister, pustule, cyst, erosion, ulcer, telangiectasia, sclerosis, scar, atrophy, scaling, crust, lichenification, gangrene)
